Here we're using stuff from the iris dataset
```{r}
boxplot(iris$Sepal.Length ~ iris$Species)
boxplot(iris$Sepal.Width ~ iris$Species)
by(iris, iris$Species, summary)

ggplot(data = iris) + aes( x = Petal.Length, y = Petal.Width, color = Species) + geom_point() + geom_smooth()
```
